data.title: Info Haunt to Tree From B Site
data.description: Use this lineup at the start of the round to contest for Tree control, or to grab information.

data.title: Sands Retake Haunt From Spawn
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective lineup to retake Sands control.

data.title: Start Round Defender Dish Haunt
data.description: When playing at Dish, use this lineup to grab fast information. Attackers may hide from this Haunt, this is primarily used to set up a play.

data.title: Start Round Arcade Control Tether
data.description: Use this Seize lineup to combo utility for Arcade Control, or simply to contest for it.

data.title: Default Defender Haunt to Arcade From Tower
data.description: Use this lineup at the start of the round to gain fast information on Attackers pushing Arcade.

data.title: Aggressive Early A Main Information Gathering
data.description: Here's a great way to gather early information in A Main, and potentially insert one of your teammates into A Main.
